Short Description: Equity value = share price × shares outstanding.
Formula/Notes: Equity value = share price × shares outstanding.

Short Description: Total firm value = equity + debt − cash.
Formula/Notes: Total firm value = equity + debt − cash.

Short Description: Price divided by next 12‑month EPS estimate.
Common Synonyms: Forward PE; next-12m PE; NTM PE
Formula/Notes: Price divided by next 12‑month EPS estimate.

Short Description: P/E divided by EPS growth rate.
Formula/Notes: P/E divided by EPS growth rate.

Short Description: Market cap divided by book equity.
Formula/Notes: Market cap divided by book equity.

Short Description: EV divided by free cash flow.
Formula/Notes: EV divided by free cash flow.

Short Description: Earnings before interest, taxes, depreciation, amortization.
Common Synonyms: Earnings before interest, taxes, depreciation, amortization
Formula/Notes: Earnings before interest, taxes, depreciation, amortization.

Metric Name: Cash Conversion Ratio (Operating CF / Net Income)

Short Description: Net income − CFO, scaled by assets or income.
Formula/Notes: Net income − CFO, scaled by assets or income.

Short Description: Price divided by FCF per share.
Formula/Notes: Price divided by FCF per share.

Short Description: Price / tangible book value per share.
Formula/Notes: Price / tangible book value per share.
